H0.text: What is the name of the river that runs through Madrid. Tagus

H1.text: What is the name of the river that runs through Madrid. Jarama

H2.text: What is the name of the river that runs through Madrid. Guadarrama

H3.text: What is the name of the river that runs through Madrid. Manzanares

A4.text: The Manzanares flows from the Sierra de Guadarrama, passes through Madrid, and eventually empties into the Jarama river.

A5.text: It empties into the Jarama within the municipal limits of Rivas Vaciamadrid.
